attributes.action: Special exemption for British expats to return home.
attributes.background: Support British expats overseas who are fully vaccinated with UK-approved vaccines and have their own private homes to home quarantine in. We are desperate to see family in the UK, we respect the decision to keep the UK safe and would fully comply with home quarantine and additional testing.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571447
